f k

| 9 |  | ldualvs.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 10 |  | ldualvs.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. K , f e. F |-> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { k } ) ) ) = ( k e. K , f e. F |-> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { k } ) ) ) |

| 14 |  | #P_sneq | |- ( k = X -> { k } = { X } ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_xpeq2d | |- ( k = X -> ( V X. { k } ) = ( V X. { X } ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( k = X -> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { k } ) ) = ( f oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( f = G -> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) = ( G oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( G oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) e. _V |
| 19 | 16, 17, 11, 18 | #P_ovmpt2 | |- ( ( X e. K /\ G e. F ) -> ( X ( k e. K , f e. F |-> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { k } ) ) ) G ) = ( G oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 10, 19 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X ( k e. K , f e. F |-> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { k } ) ) ) G ) = ( G oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) ) |
| 21 | 13, 20 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb G ) = ( G oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) ) |
